edge: At the 14th Zee Cine Awards, Kahaani won Best Film (Critics) out of fifteen nominations.

node_2: most entertaining film of the year
edge: At the 3rd ceremony of the BIG Star Entertainment Awards, Kahaani was awarded Most Entertaining Film of the Year.
At the 60th National Film Awards, Ghosh won Best Screenplay (Original).
At the 60th National Film Awards, Namrata Rao won Best Editing for Kahaani.
At the 14th Zee Cine Awards, Vidya Balan won Best Actress (Critics) for Kahaani.
At the 60th National Film Awards, Nawazuddin Siddiqui won a Special Jury award for his performance in Kahaani.
